mapper.insert: INSERT INTO km_s_sub (id, subscriber_id, sub_set, operator_id, begin_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{subscriberId}, #{subSet}, #{operatorId}, #{beginTime})

INSERT INTO km_s_pub (id, pub_set, provider_id, m_sub_id, ins_id, version, visibility, stability, operator_id, begin_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{pubSet}, #{providerId}, #{modelSubId}, #{insId}, #{version}, #{visibility}, #{stability}, #{operatorId}, #{beginTime})
mapper.select: SELECT spub.provider_id FROM km_s_pub spub WHERE spub.provider_id LIKE #{provider_id_pattern} AND spub.end_time IS NULL GROUP BY spub.provider_id

SELECT ssub.id, ssub.subscriber_id, msub.group, msub.name, spub.stability, spub.version, ssub.begin_time, ssub.end_time FROM km_s_sub ssub, km_s_pub spub, mm_m_sub msub WHERE spub.pub_set = ssub.sub_set AND spub.m_sub_id = msub.id AND msub.group LIKE #{group_pattern} AND ssub.end_time IS NULL GROUP BY ssub.id

SELECT ssub.id, ssub.subscriber_id, msub.group, msub.name, spub.stability, spub.version, ssub.begin_time, ssub.end_time FROM km_s_sub ssub, km_s_pub spub, mm_m_sub msub WHERE spub.pub_set = ssub.sub_set AND spub.m_sub_id = msub.id AND ssub.id = #{id} AND ssub.subscriber_id = #{subscriberId} AND ssub.end_time IS NULL GROUP BY ssub.id

SELECT spub.pub_set, spub.provider_id, spub.m_sub_id, spub.visibility, spub.stability, spub.version, spub.operator_id, spub.begin_time, spub.end_time FROM km_s_pub spub, km_s_sub ssub WHERE ssub.id = #{id} AND ssub.sub_set = spub.pub_set GROUP BY ssub.id AND ssub.end_time IS NULL
